name: Bait (itch)
description:
You are a purple circle.
You are to run from another circle, this one a different colour to you: red.
You must lure this red circle into the orange box before it touches you, without touching the box yourself.
Each time you die or get a BAIT, all the pieces change positions, spicing things up.

This game is very simple in concept and is essentially a prototype. I'm hopefully going to continuously update and change the game in the future, iterating on this insanely simple and mildly annoying concept.

Let me know of any suggestions, feedback, bug reports, and legal issues (shudders) in the comments section!

CONTROLS

WASD to move.
Smack SPACE to begin

Any questions?
